name: Mienshao
flavorText:
It wields the fur on its arms like a whip.
Its arm attacks come with such rapidity
that they cannot even be seen.

previous.name: Mienfoo
previous.flavorText:
In fights, they dominate with onslaughts
of flowing, continuous attacks. With
their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

next.name: Druddigon
next.flavorText:
It warms its body by absorbing sunlight
with its wings. When its body temperature
falls, it can no longer move.
